body:
Hi


I run Dayim on a Macbook Pro (OSX 10.5 and on the earlier 10.4). Current
configuration is to use Parallels Desktop for Mac to run XP 95, then
installed the windows version of Daysim on this. I've also used Apple
Bootcamp / XP / Daysim combination as well. 


Regards


Sean Mooney
